marklogic.body:
Can I have my cd's back? .... And I get the dog!! Seriously , I hate to see this relationship break up, but I totes understand the parting of emotions and celeb crushes. Bean, I have a little downton in my abbey, too!
Just promise that we'll Always have a special place for Rob in our hearts (and all those other Twilight males that have fallen by the wayside. *Cough*Jenowa*Cough*) and all will be fine.
Everyone grows up...dammit.
THANKS FOR THE SHITS AND GIGGLES, LADIES!!!!
